dreams.title: Flying in the sky
dreams.description: I had a dream where I was flying above the clouds.

dreams.title: Meeting a celebrity
dreams.description: I dreamt that I met my favorite actorChristian Bale and we had a conversation.

dreams.title: Winning the lottery
dreams.description: I dreamt that I won the lottery jackpot without even playing.

dreams.title: Regular day
dreams.description: I dreamt that I lived through a regular day at work. All was normal except that I had a different history from my real self. All my relationships were different and I felt more confident.
